topics.title: Patch 7.11 Notes
topics.description:
Patch 7.11 adds a variety of new items as well as the sixth ultimate duty, Futures Rewritten.


* Additional features will be implemented in future updates: A new custom deliveries client (Nitowikwe), Wachumeqimeqi quests, and Inconceivably Further Hildibrand Adventures sidequests are scheduled to be released in Patch 7.15. The Cloud of Darkness (Chaotic) is scheduled to be released one week after Patch 7.15. Additional role quests are scheduled to be released in Patch 7.16.

Read the patch notes.

topics.title: 40% Off Dawntrail Collector's Box – Ends December 9
topics.description:
Save 40% on the FINAL FANTASY XIV: Dawntrail Collector's Box for a limited time!

Read on for details.

topics.title: Patch 7.1—Crossroads Special Site Updated!
topics.description:
The Patch 7.1 special site has been updated with CG artwork of the bosses from Echoes of Vana'diel - Jeuno: The First Walk.

Visit the special site.

topics.title: Increased Mog Coin Bonuses on the FFXIV Companion App!
topics.description: For a limited time, the FINAL FANTASY XIV Companion app is offering increased bonuses for Mog Coin purchases!

topics.title: Presenting a First Look at FINAL FANTASY XIV MOBILE!
topics.description:
Presenting FINAL FANTASY XIV MOBILE, an official mobile title based on FINAL FANTASY XIV, developed by Lightspeed Studios under the supervision of Square Enix.

The game is scheduled for testing in several regions ahead of its initial launch in Mainland China. Adjustments will then be made based on feedback before its planned release for global audiences.

topics.title: Join us for Mister Foxclon’s Neighborhood on December 20!
topics.description: Join us for another episode with Global Community Producer Toshio “Foxclon” Murouchi as he visits housing designed by Warriors of Light all around the globe! Whether your design is an ensemble of your favorite furnishings, a hangout for your friends, or a studio for taking screenshots, come share your housing ideas or learn from fellow enthusiasts as Foxclon discovers just how creative our Housing Designers of Light can be!

topics.title: Crystalline Conflict Season Twelve Commences!
topics.description:
Crystalline Conflict Season Twelve has commenced! Aspire to even greater heights and secure your Crystalline legacy!

Beginning with this season, players will now compete for the top spot in their respective physical data centers. Coinciding with this change, adjustments have been made to ranked matches and standings. We advise players to familiarize themselves with the changes before diving into the fray.

Read on for details.

topics.title: PvP Series 6 Draws to a Close as Series 7 Begins!
topics.description:
After myriad battles fought and won, PvP Series 6 has ended. Rewards for Series 6 may be claimed until the end of Series 7.

For those eager to dive back into the fray, we are pleased to announce that PvP Series 7 has officially begun! The more you play, the more bountiful the rewards, so we encourage all players to try their hand at PvP!

Read on for details.

topics.title: New Optional Item Available!
topics.description:
A new optional item will be added to the FINAL FANTASY XIV Online Store starting Tuesday, November 12 around 2:00 a.m. (PST).

Visit the FINAL FANTASY XIV Online Store.


* The item featured above will be available for purchase after the scheduled maintenance on Tuesday, November 12 around 2:00 a.m. (PST). Please visit the News section for detailed maintenance information. 
* During periods immediately following the sale of new optional items, congestion in the delivery system may cause item deliveries to take longer than usual.

topics.title: Patch 7.1 Notes
topics.description:
We are proud to present the patch notes for Crossroads, which follows the Warrior of Light's continued adventures on the continent of Tural, and features the first installment in the new alliance raid series, Echoes of Vana'diel, in which the worlds of FINAL FANTASY XI and XIV collide.

A host of other additions includes Pelupelu allied society quests, new trials, and more.


* Additional features will be implemented in future updates: Futures Rewritten (Ultimate) is scheduled to be released in Patch 7.11. A new custom deliveries client (Nitowikwe), Wachumeqimeqi quests, and Inconceivably Further Hildibrand Adventures sidequests are scheduled to be released in Patch 7.15. The Cloud of Darkness (Chaotic) is scheduled to be released one week after Patch 7.15. Additional role quests are scheduled to be released in Patch 7.16.

Read the patch notes.

topics.title: Letter from the Producer LIVE Part LXXXIV Digest Released
topics.description:
We’re pleased to announce that the Letter from the Producer LIVE Part LXXXIV event digest has been released!

If you weren’t able to watch the live stream, or if you just want to watch it again, be sure to check it out!

Proceed to the thread.

topics.title: Patch 7.1 Notes (Preliminary)
topics.description:
We are pleased to present the preliminary patch notes for Patch 7.1─Crossroads.

 Read the patch notes.

topics.title: Announcing the LOGOS Collaboration Outdoor Gear!
topics.description:
We are pleased to announce our collaboration with Japanese outdoor gear brand LOGOS!

Emblazoned with FFXIV-themed characters and designs, our collaboration outdoor gear is sure to come in handy when enjoying the great outdoors!

topics.title: Patch 7.1—Crossroads Special Site Updated!
topics.description: The Patch 7.1 special site has been updated with new details, including the following:

topics.title: Watch the Latest Episode of Duty Commenced!
topics.description:
The latest episode of the North American Community team's Duty Commenced live show has been archived and is now available to view! Couldn't join the team live this time? No problem! The episode is available to watch below or on the official FINAL FANTASY XIV Twitch channel.

This time, the Community team reviewed more Patch 7.1 details and announcements from the latest Letter from the Producer LIVE!

topics.title: FINAL FANTASY XIV Patch 7.1 Fan Kit Released!
topics.description:
We've released a new fan kit featuring artwork from Patch 7.1─Crossroads.

Download the fan kit.

topics.title: Join us for Duty Commenced on November 6!
topics.description:
The next episode of Duty Commenced, the North American Community team's live show, is set for Wednesday, November 6. Join the Community team while they recap the latest information on Patch 7.1 from the Letter from the Producer LIVE. As always, there will be a showcase of the latest entries for Community Commendations and giveaways!

Read on for details.

topics.title: Patch 7.1—Crossroads Special Site Updated!
topics.description: The Patch 7.1 special site has been updated with the following details:

topics.title: FFXIV x Flibustier Paris Official Jewelry Collection
topics.description:
We are happy to announce that we are partnering with Flibustier Paris for a collection of official FFXIV jewelry, featuring exclusive designs from the three Grand Companies: the Maelstrom, the Order of the Twin Adder, and the Immortal Flames! You can pre-order your favorite on Flibustier Paris' website right now!

Read on for details.

topics.title: FINAL FANTASY XIV: Dawntrail | The Art of Succession – Relics of Heritage – Now Available for Pre-order!
topics.description:
We are thrilled to announce that pre-orders are now open for the Dawntrail art collection, The Art of Succession -Relics of Heritage-!

This extensive volume contains approximately 1,000 pieces of enchanting artwork, including concept art, character designs, environment art, dungeon and trial illustrations, weapon and gear designs, and much more besides. Immerse yourself in the richly detailed visual world of Tural!

developers.title: Mister Foxclon's Neighborhood Airs December 20!
developers.description:
Greetings everyone, this is Voltenyne from the Community team! 

The next episode of our housing showcase stream, Mister Foxclon's Neighborhood, will be airing on Friday, December 20!

developers.title: All You Gotta Do Is Just Meet Me at PAX Aus 2024
developers.description:
Lali-ho! Kiwikopo here, reporting in with stories from the team's adventures in the wonderful land of Oz--I mean Australia--this year.

We attended both Melbourne International Games Week and PAX Australia in early October, and for the first time in a decade, a few members of the Development team also flew over from Japan to join us in celebrating FFXIV in the land Down Under.

developers.title: Community Spotlight: Littlejem
developers.description:
Scree-tings, one and all! This is the Community team reporting in with our next Community Spotlight~

Any Warriors of Light out there who attended the Fan Festival 2023 in London or tuned in online will surely remember Yoshi-P's iconic entrance onto the stage dressed in a viper costume.

developers.title: You Think I'm Going to Fall for an Illusion?!
developers.description:
Hello everyone, this is Pumpkin Spicycre from the Community team!

The fall weather really swooped in once we neared October! Seems like just several days ago, we were still wearing summer clothing and complaining about the heat; that's all gone as if it were simply an illusion!

developers.title: Gamescom 2024 & Cologne Fan Celebration Recap
developers.description:
Hello, everyone!

This is Vystenya, Chesskyth, and Alevercey from the EU Community team, back with a special recap for gamescom 2024.

developers.title: Journey (PAX) West, unto Tural!
developers.description:
Hello, everyone! 

Ali here from the FFXIV Marketing team! I'm so excited to be back with another recap, this time for PAX West 2024! As we journeyed west to Tural, so too did we journey west to Seattle, Washington to bring exciting activities to our Warriors of Light! I'm also thrilled to be joined by Francis from the Marketing team and Minaryne from the Community team who will help me paint the picture of PAX West as beautifully as any pictomancer...

developers.title: Community Spotlight: Hector Hectorson
developers.description:
Greetings, Warriors of Light!

Have you ever stepped into extreme or savage duties in FINAL FANTASY XIV? If so, do you prefer progressing through the fight without any hints, or would you look to consult a guide?

developers.title: An Anniversary Rising
developers.description:
Ohokaliy! It's Kiwikopo from the Community team~ 

Have you been enjoying the Moonfire Faire? If you have yet to partake in the summery festivities, you'll have until Monday, August 26 at 7:59 a.m. (PDT) to complete the event quest and receive the Uchiwasshoi emote. Don't forget to give the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course a go as well, I promise the view is worth it!

developers.title: "Give it All" in the Arcadion!
developers.description:
Hello, Warriors of Light!   I'm Francis from the Marketing team, and like many of you I have been enraptured by "Give it All," the song that plays during the battle against Wicked Thunder in the Arcadion. 

The song's vocals were performed by Chrissy Costanza, lead vocalist for the popular rock band Against the Current, who worked in close collaboration with Masayoshi Soken and THE PRIMALS. Chrissy was amazing to work with and her distinct rock vocals really turn up the energy and electrify the atmosphere during battle!

developers.title: It's a Party: EU Fan Gathering Recap!
developers.description:
Greetings! This is Vystenya, Chesskyth, and Kiwikopo from the EU Community team, reporting in from London HQ with a special blog on our latest Fan Gatherings in Europe!

It's been a while since we've hosted some get-togethers with our players, and with several major events happening this year, we thought it would be a great opportunity to put the wheels back in motion.

developers.title: Waving Away the Heat This Moonfire Faire
developers.description:
Greetings! 

Sicycre from the Community team here.

developers.title: Community Spotlight: Elunia Arlana of Team Hopeless
developers.description:
Greetings one and all!

Our next community spotlight features Elunia Arlana of Team Hopeless. PvP fans will of course remember this team as the victors of the Crystalline Conflict Regional Championship 2023 in Europe and Oceania that took place at London Fan Festival!

developers.title: Gettin' Jiggly with It
developers.description:
Hello, everyone!

This is Sicycre from the Community team.

developers.title: Look at Me, I'm the Kappa Now
developers.description:
Greetings, this is Voltenyne from the Community team!

Something tells me you could use a break from FATEs. So settle in, and it'll be my pleasure to present a preview of the upcoming Make It Rain Campaign!

developers.title: Gotta Gather 'Em All: Yo-kai Watch is Back!
developers.description:
Lali-ho! This is Kiwikopo from the Community team.

Have you heard? The Yo-kai Watch collaboration event is making a return to Eorzea!

developers.title: Has your journey been good? The trail to PAX East 2024
developers.description:
Hello, everyone!

Ali here from the Square Enix America Marketing team! This will be the first time you hear from me on our official blog, and I'm thrilled to recap all of the fun from PAX East 2024! Apologies for the wait! The sea veered our boat off course, leading us on an adventure on our way back from Boston.

developers.title: Community Spotlight: Fruity Snacks
developers.description:
Greetings everyone!

The FFXIV Community team is back with another Community Spotlight! This time, we've reeled in a seasoned veteran in the world of all things fish. Presenting: Fruity Snacks!

developers.title: Introducing Pre-orders for Dawntrail
developers.description:
Greetings, this is Okieeomi from the Community team.Have you all pre-ordered our upcoming expansion, FINAL FANTASY XIV: Dawntrail?You may have seen some players already in-game sporting the pre-order bonuses such as the Wind-up Zidane minion or Azeyma's Earrings. A huge shout out to those who have already pre-ordered! We've already seen some questions like, "Which version should I get?" so today we'll go over what each version has to offer!■ Product Line-up

Our line-up for Dawntrail can be broken down into four distinct packages.* Click the images to enlarge.

developers.title: Journey to the Path Infernal
developers.description:
Greetings! This is Chesskyth from the Community team.

The long-awaited FINAL FANTASY XVI collaboration event, The Path Infernal, is on its way!Today I'd like to share a preview of some of the event details and rewards.

developers.title: A Ballad of Blossoms and Bunnies
developers.description:
Greetings, Warriors of Light! This is Kiwikopo from the Community team.

While the cold chills may not have completely vanished from the air, trees are blooming and spring is gradually settling upon us. I'm sure I'm not the only one tearing up at the thought of finally enjoying a warm day outside...
